title: Breaking Down All of ‘The Crown’ Season 4 | Bonus Episode
description:
Chris is joined by resident ‘The Crown’ expert Amanda Dobbins to break down the fourth season of the show.

Episodes 1-3 (0:55)
Episodes 4-6 (43:31)
Episodes 7-10 (69:45)

Host: Chris Ryan
Guest: Amanda Dobbins
